item.title: what happens when it all goes wrong.
item.description: today was kinda rough. morgan and I had a discussion last night that ended with our pretty much breaking up. it sucks quite a bit. I really didn’t mean for this to happen. and I don’t really know if she did either. but I am also not sure if it is something that is reconciliable or if it is just a situation that sucks and will not become “fixed.” the reasons are all valid, and rational.
